description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Teal, med blue, olive warp. Royal blue, teal and metallic blue weft. Right selvedge. Staples to 8.5 x 11" card with 99.1.1213.2.  "H-8B" and "#1 Lapis" written on card. Fabric Worksheet Stapled to reverse side of card includes weaving instructions. (blues, teal, olive, metallic blue)
title: Lapis Development Sample
